notifications.permission_info: You will be asked for notification permission
notifications.permission_denied_message:
Notifications were previously denied. To enable them:

1. Open iPhone Settings
2. Find "Jinnie" in the app list
3. Tap "Notifications"
4. Turn on "Allow Notifications"

You can continue without notifications for now.

profile.details_subtitle: This helps us personalize your experience (optional)

profile.birthday_why: We'll remind your friends about your special day
profile.affiliate_disclosure_content:
Jinnie participates in various affiliate marketing programs, which means we may earn commissions on purchases made through links on our platform.

When you click on certain product links and make a purchase, we may receive a small commission at no additional cost to you. These commissions help us maintain and improve our services.

Our affiliate relationships do not influence our recommendations or the products displayed in wishlists. We are committed to providing honest and unbiased information to help you make informed decisions.

Thank you for supporting Jinnie!
